body.name: Newbealer Steam Mop, Hardwood Floor Steamer, 500ml 1200W Powerful Cleaner for Carpet Laminate and Tiles, 3 Adjustable Steam, 15s Fast Heat-up, Carpet Glider & 2 Washable Microfiber Pads
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 41 mins
features: [Steam Mop and Carpet Cleaner] Get ready for a versatile cleaning experience with this amazing steam mop! Equipped with efficient microfiber pads and a carpet glider attachment, it's perfect for removing stubborn stains from sealed hard floors and refreshing carpets. With 3 adjustable steam modes, you can easily control the intensity of steam being released to meet your cleaning needs.

[Powerful Steam Cleaning] Blast away stubborn dirt, grime, grease, and stains with ease using this 1200W powerhouse steamer. Its rapid 15-second heating time and impressive maximum temperature of 248℉ make it a true cleaning champion. Whether you have hardwood, tile, stone, laminate, or marble floors, this steam mop has got you covered. Plus, the swivel steer mop head makes it easy to clean tricky, hard-to-reach areas.

[500ml Water Tank & Child Pet Safe] With a large 500ml water tank, this steamer can provide up to 20-35 minutes of continuous cleaning time without requiring frequent refills. What's more, with the power of steam alone, it's safe for children and pets to be around. Leave pet odors behind and welcome a fresh, spotless home with this unbeatable steam cleaner!

[Lightweight & Convenient] Weighing just 3.75 lbs and equipped with an ergonomic handle, this floor cleaner is easy to lift and use. The 16-foot power cord comes with a handy storage hook for easy organization and allows for a wide range of cleaning, while the self-standing buckle ensures that the cleaner stands on its own for easy storage in any corner of your home.

[Complete Package & 1-Year Warranty] This package includes everything you need for an effective cleaning experience: 1 Main Body, 1 Water Tank, 1 Alum. Pole, 1 Handle Grip, 1 Filling Flask, 1 Carpet Glider, 2 Mop Pads, and 1 Screw Driver and Screw for Tank. We offer a 1-year warranty with professional, friendly customer support to ensure a hassle-free experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One-hand Operation Use the power button (on the backside) to turn on/off the unit each time.Short-press steam button to switch between 3 levels. Powerful High Temp Steam 1200W power heats over 248℉ in 15s, blasting away dirt, grime, grease, and stains indoors/outdoors. Leaves your home sparkling clean! Stand on its Own Our steam mop features a unique self-standing buckle that allows it to stand on its own in any corner of your home! Enjoy the convenience! Carpet Refreshing with Ease Effortlessly remove odors and refresh your carpet with our carpet glider! Just attach the pad to the mop head, place it on the glider, and Go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and User-friendly Steam Mop
reviews.reviewText: Upon a friend's recommendation, I started using this steam mop and was immediately impressed by its performance. This mop stands out as a user-friendly, highly efficient cleaning tool that is suitable for everyone, irrespective of their strength or skill level.The mop is light, nimble, and easy to maneuver, making it a pleasure to use. It effortlessly tackles even the most stubborn stains, yet remains light enough for anyone to handle. I am genuinely impressed by its cleaning capabilities.Overall, I highly recommend this steam mop. It is a convenient and efficient tool that transforms cleaning from a tedious chore into a satisfying task. Give it a try and experience the difference yourself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes moping sooooo much easier and feels cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the steam but it leaves a lot of water on my floor. Wish I had purchased on which would suck up the dirt. The pad when it gets wet does not suck up enough water from the floor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ignore my dirty toaster. See video
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The steamer did not even turn on. I pressed it firmly and no click or lights turned on. So not only did i receive a defective product. It was also missing the pads. Not a huge problem. I was going to use cloth diaper liners instead (I can get creative because I'm a mom of 2) I also am fighting terminal brain cancer. Your company wanted it back. I followed all of the instructions. Thank God, it can be picked up for the return because getting it apart was nearly impossible. And thank God that amazon shipped it in a bigger box than the steamer came in. I'm so thankful that it's going to be picked up for return because it would be very hard for me to lug that huge box and my toddler to return it. I will be more careful about doing business with 3rd party sellers from now on. Buyer beware. I don't recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to access
reviews.reviewText: I bought a similar product, the Dupray steam cleaner, about a month back. But I got this one yesterday and it's way better. The Dupray one was too heavy and hard to move because of its long cables and hoses. Plus, it took 15 minutes to get hot. This one gets ready in seconds. For folks with laminate wood floors, this one's a winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great. Easy to ensemble. Need for hard wood for Dog accidents. Helped remove some stain. Can’t wait to try on kitchen floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wish steam mops would really heat up . I’ll keep it but disappointing that they never really work as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steam cleaner is easy to assemble, lightweight & easy to use. And, it’s very effective on my hardwoods. It has 3 levels of heat & makes great steam. I’d definitely recommend this machine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy práctico y fácil de usar.
reviews.reviewText: El único detalle que tiene el producto, es que el cable de corriente es muy corto.
